articles.title: Africa: WHO declares Cape Verde free of malaria - DW (English)
articles.description: Cape Verde has become the third country in Africa to eliminate malaria in a victory for public health authorities who followed through an extensive plan to tackle the mosquito-borne disease.
articles.content:
